response.overview: The ruins left by the Spanish Civil War at the Ciudad Universitaria, observed by one man and filmed by a group of filmmakers in the post-war period, are a gesture of resistance against oblivion and bring back the dead. The Ciudad Universitaria became a trench, a republican symbol and the place where Franco's troops entered. In Chile, the National Stadium, built in 1938, became a concentration camp during the Civil-Military Dictatorship.
response.title: La muchedumbre reaparecerá siempre
